lines.i: The common notion of "procedure" is broader than that specified by the HL7 Version 3 Reference Information Model (RIM). Therefore procedure templates can be represented with various RIM classes: act (e.g., dressing change), observation (e.g., EEG), procedure (e.g. splenectomy). This clinical statement represents procedures that result in new information about the patient that cannot be classified as a procedure according to the HL7 RIM. Examples of these procedures are diagnostic imaging procedures, EEGs and EKGs.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10520 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.13"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8282)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MoodCodeEvnInt 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.18 STATIC 2011-04-03 (CONF:8237)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8239)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8240)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProcedureActStatusCode 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.22 DYNAMIC (CONF:8245)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:16846)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:8246)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ActPriority 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16866 STATIC (CONF:8247)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:8248)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] targetSiteCode (CONF:8250), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Site Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 STATIC 2 (CONF:10121)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer (CONF:8251)
Such performers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity (CONF:8252)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:8254)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8253)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:8255)
This assignedEntity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] representedOrganization (CONF:8256)
This representedOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:8259)
This representedOrganization SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:8257)
This representedOrganization MAY contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:8258)
This representedOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:8260)

MAY contain [0..*] participant (CONF:8261, CONF:8262, CONF:15904)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Service Delivery Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.32)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:8272, CONF:8273, CONF:15905)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Contains exactly one [1..1] Instructions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:8276, CONF:8277, CONF:15906)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Contains exactly one [1..1] Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:8279, CONF:8280, CONF:15907)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:8264)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8266)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:8265)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] procedureObservationEncounter (CONF:8267)
This procedureObservationEncounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ENC" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8268)
This procedureObservationEncounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:8270)
This procedureObservationEncounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8269)
This procedureObservationEncounter MAY satisfy: Set the encounter ID to the ID of an encounter in another section to signify they are the same encounter. (CONF:16847)

@code SHOULD be selected from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96), and MAY be selected from CPT-4 (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12), ICD10 PCS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4) (CONF:19202)
code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:8242)
originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15901)
reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15902)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15903)
methodCode SHALL NOT conflict with the method inherent in Procedure / code (CONF:8249)
entryRelationship with target class encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8266)
participant with target class Service Delivery Location SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" Location (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) STATIC (CONF:8262)
entryRelationship with target class Instructions SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8274)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8282)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MoodCodeEvnInt 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.18 STATIC 2011-04-03 (CONF:8237)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8239)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8240)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProcedureActStatusCode 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.22 DYNAMIC (CONF:8245)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:8246)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ActPriority 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16866 STATIC (CONF:8247)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:16846)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:8248)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] targetSiteCode (CONF:8250), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Site Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 STATIC 2 (CONF:10121)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer (CONF:8251)
Such performers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity (CONF:8252)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:8254)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8253)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:8255)
This assignedEntity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] representedOrganization (CONF:8256)

This representedOrganization MAY contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:8258)
This representedOrganization SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:8260)

MAY contain [0..*] participant (CONF:8261, CONF:8262, CONF:15904)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Service Delivery Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.32)
